name: Castle Battles
description: Castle Battles streamlines the mechanics of classic, top-down strategy to create a fast paced style of gameplay like no other. Expand your empire by building castles near bountiful resources, collect gold to amass outlandish armies, and swarm your enemies in 40 unique levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9+ Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9+ Storage: 1 GB available space
